mapper.select: select p.id, p.no, p.name, p.inserted_at as insertedAt, u.name as uName, c.name as cName, c.contact_name as contactName, c.contact_tel as contactTel from project p LEFT JOIN `user` u ON (u.id = p.create_user_id) LEFT JOIN customer c ON (c.id = p.customer_id) ORDER BY p.inserted_at DESC

select p.no, p.name, p.inserted_at as insertedAt, u.name as uName, c.name as cName, c.contact_name as contactName, c.contact_tel as contactTel from project p INNER JOIN `user` u ON (u.id = p.create_user_id) INNER JOIN customer c ON (c.id = p.customer_id)
and p.no = #{no}
and p.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and c.name like concat('%',#{cName},'%')
ORDER BY p.inserted_at DESC
